text.div:
ServiceRequestSubjectfamilySearchParameter

Parameter subject.family:string

Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ServiceRequestSubjectfamilySearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
